languages.text: {n}Кассия вскидывает руку в протестующем жесте, но тут же хватается за {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}сияющий камень{/d} на шее. Болезненная гримаса искажает ее странные черты.{/n} "Я... прежде желаю говорить с {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольным Торговцем{/g}. Оставьте нас".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кассия вскидывает руку в протестующем жесте, но тут же хватается за амулет на шее. Болезненная гримаса искажает ее странные черты.{/n} "Я... прежде желаю говорить с {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольным Торговцем{/g}. Оставьте нас".

languages.text: {n}Cassia sharply raises her hand in protest, but then closes it around the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}glowing stone{/d} in her throat. A pained grimace twists her uncanny features.{/n} "I... first wish to speak with the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Leave us."
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия вскидывает руку в протестующем жесте, но тут же хватается за {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}сияющий камень{/d} на шее. Болезненная гримаса искажает ее странные черты.{/n} "Я... прежде желаю говорить с {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольным Торговцем{/g}. Оставьте нас".

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia sharply raises her hand in protest, but then closes it around the amulet at her throat. A pained grimace twists her uncanny features.{/n} "I... first wish to speak with the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Leave us."

{n}Cassia sharply raises her hand in protest, but then closes it around the amulet at her throat. A pained grimace twists her uncanny features.{/n} "I... first wish to speak with the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Leave us."

{n}Cassia sharply raises her hand in protest, but then closes it around the amulet at her throat. A pained grimace twists her uncanny features.{/n} "I... first wish to speak with the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Leave us."

{n}Cassia sharply raises her hand in protest, but then closes it around the glowing stone in her throat. A pained grimace twists her uncanny features.{/n} "I... first wish to speak with the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Leave us."

languages.text: {n}卡西娅急忙举起手抗议，但随后又把手放在喉咙处{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}发亮的石头{/d}上。她的脸上露出了痛苦的表情，异于常人的五官也扭曲起来。{/n}“我……我想先和{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}谈谈，让我们独处一会儿。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia sharply raises her hand in protest, but then closes it around the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}glowing stone{/d} in her throat. A pained grimace twists her uncanny features.{/n} "I... first wish to speak with the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Leave us."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅急忙举起手抗议，但随后又把手放在喉咙处的护身符上。她的脸上露出了痛苦的表情，异于常人的五官也扭曲起来。{/n}“我……我想先和{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}谈谈，让我们独处一会儿。”

languages.text: {n}Cassia hebt protestierend die Hand, legt sie dann aber um den {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}leuchtenden Stein{/d} in ihrem Hals. Ein Ausdruck des Schmerzes verzerrt ihre unheimlichen Züge.{/n} "Ich ... möchte zunächst mit {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin}{/g} sprechen. Lasst uns alleine."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia sharply raises her hand in protest, but then closes it around the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}glowing stone{/d} in her throat. A pained grimace twists her uncanny features.{/n} "I... first wish to speak with the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Leave us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia hebt protestierend die Hand, umschließt dann aber damit das Amulett um ihren Hals. Ein Ausdruck des Schmerzes verzerrt ihre unheimlichen Züge.{/n} "Ich ... möchte zunächst mit {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} sprechen. Lasst uns alleine."

languages.text: {n}Cassia lève brusquement la main en signe de protestation, puis la referme sur la {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}pierre lumineuse{/d} qu'elle porte autour du cou. Son étrange visage se tord de douleur.{/n} « Je... j'aimerais avant tout m'entretenir avec {mf|le|la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g}. Laissez-nous. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia sharply raises her hand in protest, but then closes it around the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}glowing stone{/d} in her throat. A pained grimace twists her uncanny features.{/n} "I... first wish to speak with the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Leave us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia lève brusquement la main en signe de protestation, puis la referme sur l'amulette qu'elle porte autour du cou. Son étrange visage se tord de douleur.{/n} « Je... j'aimerais avant tout m'entretenir avec {mf|le|la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g}. Laissez-nous. »

languages.text: {n}カシアは抗議しようとバッと手を上げたが、喉元の{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}光る石{/d}のある辺りに手を添える。険しい表情が、彼女の人間離れした顔立ちを歪めた。{/n}「あたくしは…まず{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}と話がしたいのです。二人きりにしてください」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia sharply raises her hand in protest, but then closes it around the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}glowing stone{/d} in her throat. A pained grimace twists her uncanny features.{/n} "I... first wish to speak with the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Leave us."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは抗議しようとバッと手を上げたが、喉元の{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}光る石{/d}の辺りに手を添える。険しい表情が、彼女の人間離れした顔立ちを歪めた。{/n}「私は…まず{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}と話がしたいです。二人きりにしてください」
{n}カシアは抗議しようとバッと手を上げたが、喉元の{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}光る石{/d}のある辺りに手を添える。険しい表情が、彼女の人間離れした顔立ちを歪めた。{/n}「あたくしは…まず{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}と話がしたいのです。二人きりにしてください」

languages.text: {n}Cassia levanta la mano en señal de protesta, pero se la lleva a la {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}piedra brillante{/d} que tiene en el cuello. Una mueca de dolor deforma sus singulares rasgos.{/n} "Yo... quiero hablar con {mf|el|la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} antes. Déjennos".
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia sharply raises her hand in protest, but then closes it around the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}glowing stone{/d} in her throat. A pained grimace twists her uncanny features.{/n} "I... first wish to speak with the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Leave us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia levanta la mano en señal de protesta, pero se la lleva al amuleto que tiene en el cuello. Una mueca de dolor deforma sus singulares rasgos.{/n} "Yo... quiero hablar con {mf|el|la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} antes. Déjennos".

languages.text: {n}Cassia itiraz maksatlı olarak hızla elini kaldırıyor, ardından parmaklarını boğazındaki {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}parlayan taşın{/d} üzerine kapatıyor. Esrarlı yüz hatları acı dolu bir ifadeyle buruşuyor.{/n} "Ben... Öncelikle {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} ile konuşmak istiyorum. Bizi yalnız bırak."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia sharply raises her hand in protest, but then closes it around the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}glowing stone{/d} in her throat. A pained grimace twists her uncanny features.{/n} "I... first wish to speak with the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Leave us."
